item.title: The whole road is without street lights in front of the college, 7th June
item.description:
Whole length of Western Road

item.title: Wonky tree, 7th June
item.description:
The young tree in front of our house has been anchored to a wooden stake in the ground which is causing it to lean towards our house (12 Russet Road). Would it please be possible to move the stake so that the tree stands up straight? Many thanks in advance for any assistance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Russet Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Arle Court Underpass - Rubbish left from KFC, 7th June
item.description:
Rubbish left in underpass (Benhall side) and bizarrely stuck on structure from KFC near by. Also some lager cans, coke bottles left in vicinity (Benhall side walkway)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in nature reserve, 7th June
item.description:

item.title: Resident's vegetation has left most of the pavement inaccessible., 7th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Medoc Close, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 7th June
item.description:
28 day with outside lane closure needed please cut back overgrown vegetation obscuring the traffic coming from the right approximately 10 metres unable to stop (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resident's vegetation has left most of the pavement inaccessible., 7th June
item.description:
Address: 35 Limber Hill. Pavement is on the path that runs alongside Wymans Brook. The vegetation is growing such that most of the pavement is inaccessible and branches are at head/shoulders level. As the pavement has railings to one side there is no way to walk around it, you have to duck underneath. Has been an issue for several months and is getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Limber Hill, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
